study_name: Action to Control Cardiovascular Risk in Diabetes (ACCORD-BioLINCC)

variable.variable_name: MI, Stroke or Any Death censoring flag (0=event, 1=censored)
variable.variable_description: MI, Stroke or Any Death censoring flag (0=event, 1=censored)
variable.data_hierarchy: BL_ACCORD/CVDOUTCOMES/MI, Stroke or Any Death censoring flag (0=event, 1=censored)

variable.variable_description: MI, Stroke or Any Death Follow-up time (years)
variable.data_hierarchy: BL_ACCORD/CVDOUTCOMES/MI, Stroke or Any Death Follow-up time (years)

variable.variable_name: Study Days: number of days following randomization
variable.variable_description: Study Days: number of days following randomization
variable.data_hierarchy: BL_ACCORD/CONCOMITANTMEDS/Study Days: number of days following randomization
